Variables

Jul 9, 2019

You can use the below variables to pull from numerous sources within the site:

layout.title => will pull front matter variables from layout files.
page.title => will pull front matter variables from your actual pages.
site.title => will pull variables from the _config.yml file.

These can be referenced from pretty much anywhere.

More info can be found here!

Your awesome title

  • Your awesome title
  • your-email@example.com
  • jekyll
  • jekyllrb

Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.
